title: cat
html: I heard something outside my window. I looked out and saw a tabby tail through the leaves. A few seconds later, it pops out at the top of the tree. I can hear baby birds chirping, and I see the cat chewing.

relatedPosts.title: assembly
relatedPosts.html: Last week I was assembling a bunch of furniture. I like doing that. I almost took a job doing it after college. Driving around in a van assembling people’s ikea shelves. That would’ve been fun.
